alert.note: Alert for Bonner; Boundary (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 10:29PM MDT until May 21 at 11:15PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: The National Weather Service in Spokane has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Boundary County in the Panhandle of Idaho... East central Bonner County in the Panhandle of Idaho... * Until 1015 PM PDT. * At 929 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northeast of Kootenai, or 14 miles northeast of Sandpoint, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Elmira. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 484 and 492. U.S. Highway 2 in Idaho between mile markers 71 and 80. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
